We localized the product language for a better user experience.

From today, "Viamaker" Officially renamed to"CapCut"!
[ Capture the moment and Cut ]
Capture every moment to help you easily cut out a beautiful life.

Blink Blink! Plenty of tools just got updated to optimize your daily video cutting experience.
1. Support HD-Video Import without compression.
2. Also, support HD-Video Export to elevate your work. 
3. Add Background Cutout feature: Cutout with only a couple of steps.
4. Allow multiple Effects overlay to enrich the editing results.
5. Support One-step Sharing to Tiktok that helps your win more likes.
6. Add Catalog Tags in Feedback to locating your problem accurately. 
7. Clear Application Cache for speed up.
we've made some performance improvements to make your in-app experience even better.

1. New key frame function, support for adding key frames to videos and pictures
2. Support more canvas ratios to make your video cinematic

1. New key frame function, support for adding key frames to videos and pictures.
2. Support more canvas ratios to make your video cinematic.
3. Support easy sharing and exporting to 3rd party platforms.

1. New key frame function, support for adding key frames to videos and pictures.
2. Support more canvas ratios to make your video cinematic.
3. Support easy sharing and exporting to 3rd party platforms.
Add comic function, turn your photo into comic effect with one click
Add comic function, turn your photo into comic effect with one click
The template feature is going live! Capture beautiful moments with customized templates for you.
The template feature is going live! Capture beautiful moments with customized templates for you.
we've made some performance improvements to make your in-app experience even better.

Adapted to Indonesian/Vietnamese/Philippines local languages to better serve global users
1. Enhanced key frame function now supports editing of audio, text, sticker, and filter.
2. Filter Categories added! More filters for you to choose from.
3. Support customizing the cover page for your video.
4. Support changing text style to bold/italic/underline.

1. Add subtitle recognition function, recognize English voice and  generate subtitles automatically, come and try
2. Unlimited video export time, removing the 15-minute limit
3. Add comment function, support to express your opinion

1. Add subtitle recognition function, recognize English voice and  generate subtitles automatically, come and try
2. Unlimited video export time, removing the 15-minute limit
3. Add comment function, support to express your opinion

1. Extend video color parameters, support adjustment of vignetting, light perception, particles, etc.
2. Improve performance and optimize experience
Ding ding ding! A new "Following" category has been added to Templates, so you'll never miss out on the latest templates from your fave creators. Check it out!
Ding ding ding! A new "Following" category has been added to Templates, so you'll never miss out on the latest templates from your fave creators. Check it out!

1. A new text template feature allows you to play with more text styles, and it’s easier than before 
2. Your text can now be read aloud! Convert text to speech to quickly generate voice overs

Ding ding ding! We’ve got some big updates to help you produce amazing videos, quicker and more easily than ever:
1. New cartoon effects to try
2. A new Text to speech feature so you can quickly create voice-overs
3. Support video anti-shake, recording video more easily

Ding ding ding! We’ve got some big updates to help you produce amazing videos
1. Smart Keying effects that make superimposing people on backgrounds easier than ever
2.New functional tutorial guide makes learning editing easier

We've introduced and upgraded some features to help you make even more amazing videos 
1. New Smooth slow motion feature
2. New sound effect search feature
3. New HSL adjustment feature: achieve your favorite color tone
